title: Deep Gnome
content:
Deep Gnome Racial Features Gnome Cunning Base Racial Speed Subrace Traits Superior Darkvision Stone Camouflage

Gnome Cunning Base Racial Speed

Superior Darkvision Stone Camouflage

Deep Gnome is a Subrace of Gnome in Baldur's Gate 3. Deep Gnome features great vision at night and also possesses the Stone Camouflage. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races
